description: The Department of National Defence (DND), 31 Canadian Brigade Group (31 CBG) and Regional Cadet Support Unit (RCSU) require catering services throughout Region 1 - Windsor, Region 2 - Cedar Springs, Chatham and Region 4- Sarina on an as and when requested basis. It is the intention of the Crown to issue one (1) Standing Offer for each Area listed in Annex "B" to satisfy this requirement. Should one (1) Offeror provide the lowest evaluated price for multiple Areas, PWGSC will issue one (1) Standing Offer for those Areas.
